m_szDocTitle: China modeled electric-car policies on California
m_szDocSumamry: China modeled electric-car policies on California January 20, 2016 | In: News & Trends Leave a Comment If you’re looking for an example of aggressively pro-electric-car policies, look to California. The Golden State offers rebates to buyers of new electric cars, allows them to drive solo in carpool lanes, and has a zero-emission vehicle mandate that forces carmakers to sell at least some electric cars there. China is certainly trying to promote electric cars. The national government hopes putting greater numbers of zero-emission vehicles on the country’s roads will help alleviate terrible air
